execution_plan.description: Find orders that contain at least two distinct products by aggregating Order_Items, and return those order IDs with their order dates from Orders.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.order_id, o.date_order_placed FROM Orders o JOIN (SELECT order_id FROM Order_Items GROUP BY order_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) >= 2) oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id;
